#### Tender Description

The Government of Canada, through Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is inviting bids for the provision of Aerological Observation Services at The Pas Upper Air Station, Manitoba. The successful bidder will be responsible for preparing instruments, conducting upper air soundings, and ensuring the prompt transmission of data.

The contract includes administrative responsibilities, such as maintaining inventory, preparing monthly reports, and providing technical support for equipment maintenance.
